item.title: Kymatio
item.description: Kymatio is a Python module for computing wavelet and scattering transforms. It is built on top of PyTorch, but also has a fast CUDA backend via cupy and skcuda. Use kymatio if you need a library that: integrates wavelet scattering in a deep learning architecture, supports 1-D, 2-D, and 3-D wavelets, and runs seamlessly on CPU and GPU hardware. A brief intro to wavelet scattering is provided in User Guide.
